message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those looking for quality and excellence. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to experience the product at a slightly higher value than usual, reflecting its superior craftsmanship and functionality. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to hear your positive response soon.
